= Externals =

Packedpixel Raidplaner uses the following 3rd party scripts.<br>
Some of these have been extended and/or modified to fix issues or improve integration.

 * *jQuery* (http://jquery.com)
 * *jQuery UI* (http://jqueryui.com/)
 * *jQuery hash change event plugin* (http://benalman.com/projects/jquery-hashchange-plugin/)
 * *Chris Schuld's Browser detection* (http://chrisschuld.com/projects/browser-php-detecting-a-users-browser-from-php/)
 * *CryptoJS* (https://code.google.com/p/crypto-js/)
 * *Javascript-BCrypt* (https://code.google.com/p/javascript-bcrypt/)
